com.qualcomm.hardware.modernrobotics

Class ModernRoboticsUsbI2cController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ArmableUsbDevice
      • com.qualcomm.hardware.modernrobotics.ModernRoboticsUsbDevice
        • com.qualcomm.hardware.modernrobotics.ModernRoboticsUsbI2cController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ReadWriteRunnable.Callback, HardwareDevice, I2cController
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ModernRoboticsUsbDeviceInterfaceModule, ModernRoboticsUsbLegacyModule

    public abstract class ModernRoboticsUsbI2cController
extends ModernRoboticsUsbDevice
implements I2cController
    This class provides a common implementation point for functionality shared amongst Modern Robotics USB I2cControllers. Not all possible shared functionality has yet been lifted here; more sharing is possible.
